content.description: Shotgun Hospitality is a Stand Start problem on the southern side of Western Bacon Steezburger.Left hand starts on a low Undercling jug (may have to get low to see it. It’s an amazing hold). Right hand start on one of the two crimp rails above at 2 o’clock. Pick your poison.  Compress and figure out how to get to the jugs for Topout.

Scofflaw Sit Start goes up the slanted hand crack in the middle of WBSB. Sit Start with your skirt in the dirt and then lift off into a mix of hand crack, lieback, and finding feet. Small hands will help on this problem!
content.location: The only crack on Western Bacon Steezburger.

content.description: Pit Bull Iron Cross is a stiff Sit Start boulder problem that starts right under Shotgun Hospitality Stand Start.As the name implies start with two wide sidepulls jugs on bomber rock.***
content.location: Under Shotgun Hospitality on the south end of Western Bacon Steezburger.

content.description: Pick The Lock OMW starts on the southern end of Western Bacon Steezburger.A super thin crimp for your left hand on the south facing wall along a thin seam and the vertical crack around the corner are the starting hands. Find and load feet and simply top out.Alex Mitchell was playing with this silly but mentally committing problem and an old trad dad came by in the  nick of time to show him how to Pick The Lock And Stay.
content.location: Thin crimp on LH around the corner and RH in vertical crack. See pics.

content.description: McTwist starts with a hand in the low crack undercling and and the starting hood for Kickflip. Pull up and top out. Starting with a hand in the low undercling changes the moves from Kickflip quite a bit. Fun *thumbs up emoji*
Kickflip sits to the left of Don’t Drink With Your Shooting Hand on a matched side pull jug sit start. Pull up from there and work your way straight up the boulder
content.location: Just left of don’t drink with your shooting hand

climbs.name: Don’t Drink With Your Shooting Hand

content.description: Don’t Drink With Your Shooting Hand is a sit start problem on the right northern edge of Western Bacon Steezburger.  Sit Start with you hands in the horizontal crack (not the right hand jug outside of the crack). Get dual cup jams/ fists and lift off. Work up the sloped right edge of the boulder and/or face and topout. Crux is the start and first couple of moves. Tricky at first.

Western Bacon Steezburger sits west of Sunset Parking and just west of Caddo Lake on a grassy slope on the south side of HWY 49 as you head west toward Choss Boss, Disco Biscuit and the west gate of the refuge.Western Bacon Steezburger hosts at least 5 challenging short lines with good falls into dirt. None of the problems are gimmes for the grade and require more technique than straight pulling :)There are a few open sit start V4/5s waiting to be put up!
